TopicTitle: Nature Man: The Old Spice of Arrakis!

Articles.Content:
Fairly new to twitch tv, introduced to it by theses forums via the KSPTV streams. The popularity of this type of media is certainly gaining momentum.

The newest is this Old Spice Nature Adventure where the audience controls the man who is wandering in the woods.

Live action video game.

Is this entertainment where the audience is the media?

It is day two of this three day adventure.

<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" height="378" width="620" data="https://www.twitch.tv/widgets/live_embed_player.swf?channel=oldspice"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="never"><param name="allowNetworking" value="internal"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="false"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/live_embed_player.swf"><param name="flashvars" value="hostname=www.twitch.tv&channel=oldspice&auto_play=false&start_volume=25"></object>
<iframe frameborder="0" scrolling="no" width="350" height="378"></iframe>

I accidentally caught sight of this yesterday and even though it is silly, I want to watch more. 

Is anyone else watching this historical event?

Any ideas to make Nature Man do something kerbal. Maybe have Nature Man yell: "Save the Round8".

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-17T21:14:18Z" title="04/17/2015 09:14  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 17, 2015</time> by MoeslyArmlis**
  
Kerbal interaction

Update:

We just had ZIPSTREAM7 command Nature Man to do science with the lobster.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T12:55:16Z" title="04/18/2015 12:55  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by MoeslyArmlis**
This is hilarious, i didn't know this sort of crap could be entertaining. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Trying to have Nature man => Examine the dirt very closely and ponder loudly what it could be made of.

Someone needs to do a parody of Rust now. With multiple people running around taking commands from users. They can build tents and tear everyone else's down, smash rocks with other rocks, etc. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

With all the things nature Man buried today I was trying to get a surface sample completed.

Tomorrow is the last day of this crazy twitch adventure. 

Will all the pieces of the golden retainer be returned to the forest fairy?
